entry.title: 建立文章的第二种方式
entry.content:
function a(){    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")    console.log("hello world!")}

二级标题

搞不懂为什么代码块会无效捏
搞不懂为什么代码块会无效捏
搞不懂为什么代码块会无效捏
搞不懂为什么代码块会无效捏
搞不懂为什么代码块会无效捏

三级标题我是上面的标题的儿子

搞不懂为什么代码块会无效捏
搞不懂为什么代码块会无效捏
搞不懂为什么代码块会无效捏

这是二级标题他哥

哎这个东西消耗我太多东西了

entry.title: code style
entry.content:

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
